modName: Harvest Moon-Player House with hot tub and Dragonborn Cave
summary:
Are you sick of loving in your castle?
And of getting everyone to do your stuff?
Want to get out to the Country?
Well download THIS mod!!
descriptionHtml:
Are you sick of loving in your castle?
And of getting everyone to do your stuff?
Want to get out to the Country?
Well download THIS mod!!
It is my first mod and it is a player house Harvest Moon located near Falkreath and includes a fully furnished country lodge with a hot tub and basement, a cave named Dragonborn Cave packed full with treasures and a spare bed weapon racks and a training dummy. The house is furnished with a bed room with a full set of Dwemer armor/armour and a kitchen.

I recommend these very mods
AKM - Advanced KillMoves - fixed Dragon music
Heavy Armory - New Weapons

DAWNGUARD REQUIRED!!!!!
author: JoeruKodo
